text: Gulf Arabic ( local pronunciation: or , local pronunciation: ) is a variety of the Arabic language spoken in Eastern Arabia around the coasts of the Persian Gulf in Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, the United Arab Emirates, eastern Saudi Arabia, northern Oman, and by some Iranian Arabs.Languages of Iran Ethnologue ==References== ===Citations=== ===Sources=== * * * * ==Further reading== * Category:Languages of Iran Category:Languages of Oman Category:Arabic language
title: Gulf Arabic
